text: Hello <@UNWHHSWHJ> gm:slightly_smiling_face: I have  doubt regarding that...Apart from adding this module,there is no other solution? Because the template was made using custom modules when it got published and now adding email body will hamper the design.
as far as I know, for the blog/rss email, `email_body` is must. you can still stylise it by using cssâ€¦
